pr_title: Add some more logs to bash script used for DockerHealthcheckWaitStratgyTest

timeline.message:
Add some more logs to bash script used for DockerHealthcheckWaitStrategyTest

Echo once file has been written and make bash script fail on error.

timeline.bodyText:
Perhaps we should do:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            set -e
          
          
            
            set -ex
          
      
    
    
  

so that the shell automatically logs the command that's about to be run.
We could actually just get rid of all the echos then...
timeline.author: rnorth

replies.bodyText: Good idea, added your suggestion accordingly.
replies.author: kiview

timeline.message: Remove echos and automatically log bash commands
